entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 10 this morning then rising. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM CDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25. POP 30%
